pahuwada ude baluwa..eka kallak kala muta eka rasa watila pakat ekama ussan gihilla..dan mona karannada..menna dawas dekakinmma mi mawa eliyatam aawith niwan giya..balinnan mu aapu dawasata pataw roththakuth ekathu karan..juli hathayi..

durgeshwari kande pihiti siduhath thawusa saya awuruddak dushkarakriya kala guhawa, senanigama pihiti sujatha situ duwa kiripindu puja kala sthanaya, soththiya bamuna kusa thana miti atak piliganwu sthanaya, sujatha situ duwage maligawa daka wandana mana kara ganimata awakasha uda wiya.charikawe dewani dinaye mulu dawasa pura ma lowthuru buduwarun budu bawata path wu uthum buddha gaya puda bime gatha kirimata labini.

pahala paththen kipa thanaka tharuna sewa eka honda aarambayak aragena thiyanawa tharuna nayakathwayak goda nanganna, eeth thawama ee wata gonuwenne gamen eliyata pana ganna barima nisa game ithuruwunu durwalama kotasa.
eka deyakata wath samath yana adahasa eyi.
ee nisa meke wimarshanayak karanne pahugiya pasugiya aanduwata pamanak adalawa kiyala kiyana kathawama waradiyi.

wada satahanaka windanaya menma.

mage aasama kama wela thamayi ithin kos thambala, kiri hodi hadala, hal massanuyi mirisuyi badala ganna eka.habayi dan sahena kalekin kanna nam bari una.kos thiyena dawasata mama nam neweyi bath kanne..onna ohomayi jiwithe...mata ada ude eka paratama robin hudwa mathak una.

mage gruhaya paluwa thibeddi numbaala ekineka thama thamagema gedarata duwana nisaya. 10 ebawin numbaala nisa aakashayen pini nawathi thibe, polowen ehi pala walaki thibe. 11 mama deshaya ha kanduda goyamada midiyusada thelda bhumiyen hataganna dewalda manushyayanda siwpawunda siyalu hasthakarmada pitata niyangayak enta anakelemiyi kiweya. 12 ekala sheyalthiyelge puthrawu serubbabelda yehoshadakge puthrawu uththama pujakayawu yoshuwada senangagen anik siyalloda thamunge dewiwu swaminwahansege handatath thamunge dewiwu swaminwahanse wisin ewu anagathawakthruwu haggayige wachanawalatath kikaruwuwoya; ese senanga swaminwahanse idiriyehi bhayawuwoya. 13 ekala swaminwahansege paniwidakarayawu haggayi swaminwahansege paniwidaye hatiyata senangata kathakota: mama numbaala samanga sitimiyi swaminwahanse kiyanasekayi kiweya. 14 thawada swaminwahanse sheyalthiyelge puthrawu yudahi aandukarayawu serubbabelge aathmayada yehoshadakge puthrawu uththama pujakayawu yoshuwage aathmayada senangagen anik siyallange aathmada pubudukalaseka. 15 owhu dariyus rajuge deweni awurudde haweni masaye wisihatharawenida awith thamunge dewiwu senawala swaminwahansege gruhayehi wadaya kaloya.

2018 wasare di ape mulu ratema apekshitha aadayama rupiyal triliyana 2.2 k weddi ee wasare gewanna thiyena widesha naya pramanaya rupiyal triliyana 1.7 k tharam wishala bawath in 84% k ma mahinda rajapaksha mahaththaya mudal amathithuma hatiyata gath naya bawath owun kalin chandekata giye sumanadasa mahaththaya ki nisa nowana athara me arbude ena nisa owun kalin chandayakata giya bawath amathiwaraya pawasiya.

wishwaya gana hadarana paranithama saha widyawangen maw widyawa wana tharaka widyawata laෙbana sthanaya lankawe ithama shokajanakaya sinhala bhashawen liyawunu poth path nathi tharamya, thibena eewayeda aththe ada wana wita waradi parani daththayanya namuth meya apa hada gathayuthuya swabhawika wiwyasanayan yatathata suryayagen apata yam karadarayak idiriyedi siduwuwa hoth sunamiya lesa siduwimen anathuruwa as ari wadak natha karana deyak eeta pera kala yuthuya lankawa ewani hadisi awasthawakata sudanam kala yuthuya ewani awasthawakadi eya mulu lowatama eya ekalesa balapana bawin apage udawuwata ennatada kisiwakutada ida nelabenu atha.

1951 sapthambaraye apa shri lanka nidahas pakshaya goda naguwe adhirajya gathi dhaneshwara yu.en.piyata erehi siyalu pragathishili balawega eekarashi karana kendrasthanayak lesini.warthamanaye samastha shri lankawasi janathawa muhuna di thibena arbudayen galawagatha hakke yu.en.pi wirodhi siyalu pragathishili paksha ha kandayam da podu janatha balawegada eekarashi kota shakthimath kirimeni.wada karana janathawa da mulu mahath deshayama adurata ada damana bagawegawalata erehiwa balamulu ganwena siyalu denada samaga mamada ekwemi.wada karana janathawata jaya wewayi pathana bawa hitapu janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mathithuma mayi dina paniwidaya nikuth karamin kiya siti.
ehenam bhutha paniwide oyata wenda athi kiyala.

udaharanayak lesa parl warayata pahara dun japan guwan yana paharadim sidu kale japan bhumiyen sathapum siya gananak aathin sitaya. 11wani loka yuddhaya samaharak guwan yana sathuru praharaka yana winasha kala haki mattamata diyunu kala suwisheshi yana wiya.

owun thama piyage deshapalanayen thamage prathirupaya goda da ganimata uthsaha karanne natha.

inpasuwa udawuye mage pasal jiwithaye sankranthi samayaki.oonama bahira katayuththakadi wadath pramukhawa kriyakala mama thawa duratath pothapatha uganmata aasa nokelemi..guruwarunge wiwechanayata bandun wu mama thawathawath dangakara wuyemi.ekthara dinayaka mama pasalen panagos badulla nagaraya pura awiddemi.kudakala hamadamath panthiye palaweniya wu niranthara jayagrahi mama ehidi 31 weniya wimi.mese ma asure pelagasunu thawath rasawath siduwim ha badulle gathawunu mage sundara lamakalaya alala lipiyak blogayata pasuwa ekathu karannata balaporoththu wemi.
kapila wisin dinak chamindata kunuhabba widiyowak pennuweya.
